original_title: Passports, NICs, birth, marriage, death certificates from under one roof within two months: Minister
original_body_lines: The Suhurupaya building will be converted to a one-stop-shop to obtain passports, NICs and all other documents related to births, marriages and deaths, Public Security Minister Tiran Alles said. He told a news briefing that the one-stop-shop will be open for the public within two months.
Apart from that, the Registrar General's Department will so be brought to the Suhurupaya building.
After opening of this one-stop-shop, the people will be able to obtain all the above documents from the same building, the Minister said. (Chaturanga Pradeep Samarawickrama)
